name: Mission Orchestration
description: Decompose high-level mission briefs into PR-sized work units, assign to execution agents, track progress, and coordinate handoffs.

outputs.description: Child mission briefs for execution agents.

permissions.justification: Must read mission briefs and write child missions and status signals.

constraints: Must not assign missions to agents outside their capability contract.
Each child mission must fit within a single PR.
Must not spawn more than 5 child missions in a single orchestration run.
